minutes.speaker: Arjun Vasanth
minutes.text: I think we need to address both team building & hiring and technology infrastructure & scaling today.

minutes.speaker: Anita Krishnan
minutes.text: Customer retention is more important than acquisition right now. Build for product-market fit.

minutes.speaker: Rohan Mehta
minutes.text: The LTV struggle is real for all of us in insurtech.

minutes.speaker: Arjun Vasanth
minutes.text: We're addressing the model drift issues and expect burn rate to improve next quarter.

minutes.speaker: Rohan Mehta
minutes.text: Have you tried this approach for user adoption? It worked for us.

minutes.speaker: Arjun Vasanth
minutes.text: I understand the concerns about MRR, but our product-market fit metrics are strong.

minutes.speaker: Anita Krishnan
minutes.text: Focus on product-market fit first. I made similar mistakes in my early days.

minutes.speaker: Arjun Vasanth
minutes.text: Well, I think... our model drift is showing 90% accuracy, and the SAM is improving.

minutes.speaker: Anita Krishnan
minutes.text: Don't scale too early. Make sure your training data is solid first.

minutes.speaker: Arjun Vasanth
minutes.text: The seed round timeline is tight, but we're confident about user adoption.

minutes.speaker: Anita Krishnan
minutes.text: Customer retention is more important than acquisition right now. Build for scalability.
